title: Tighten that wire!  Tighten that wire hard!

tasks.task: Use a wire tightener to adjust fence slack.
subtasks: Identify the problem area (slack in barbed wire).
Apply wire tightener to fence strand.
Confirm proper tension (as tight as a banjo string).

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Use a wire tightener to adjust fence slack.
subtasks: Identify the problem area (slack in barbed wire).
Apply wire tightener to fence strand.
Confirm proper tension (as tight as a banjo string).
